Description.Name: Light Ferro
Description.Details: Utilizing a weave of ferro-steel, ferro-titanium, and diamond weave fibers which boosts the tensile strength of the plating, Ferro-Fibrous Armor provides a 12% increase in protection per ton over standard armor, but takes up more space on the 'Mech or vehicle. Light Ferro-Fibrous armor takes up less space, similar to what the Clans use, but provides less protection.
